title: [Large-Scale] Mobile Instructional Design Modeling for Process-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level Science Fundamental Knowledge and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate competency in designing process-based learning within smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments

learning_goals: They can develop three or more science education modules by applying principles of competency-based learning environment design
They can establish content segmentation strategies optimized for mobile microlearning environments
They can execute iterative curriculum improvement processes through formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
